isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VISCOUS FAN DRIVE AND/OR FAN BLADE, REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VISCOUS FAN DRIVE AND/OR FAN BLADE, REPLACE

step1.para: Perform partial drain of cooling system.
Remove surge tank overflow hose from shroud.
Remove charge air cooler pipe from left side of radiator frame.
Remove inlet charge air cooler pipe/hoses from charge air cooler and turbocharger.
Loosen upper and lower radiator support struts.

note.para: On upper radiator support struts, loosen the outer nuts only. This will prevent the need to align the radiator assembly and hood. The weight of the hood will move radiator assembly forward for access to fan drive/fan blade.

step1.para: Using special tools, remove fan drive/fan blade assembly from fan drive hub.

note.para: I-6 is left hand threads, V-8 is right hand threads.

step1.para: Remove fan blade from fan drive.
Install fan blade to fan drive.
Install fan assembly to fan drive hub.
Tighten upper and lower radiator support struts.
Install both charge air cooler pipes/hoses.
Install surge tank hose to shroud.
